posts.post_content:
I have had so many posts of T206's and others for sale in the last few months, I can't keep track of what's new, what bumped, last price, still available, etc.  Rather than list 4 in a thread, pics and adding new threads as I acquire dupes, I will list them all here alphabetically and if you want a scan - please email me @ [url]Edwolf1963@aol.com[/url].  First communication takes lead, commitment to buy supersedes all else.

RAW (1) means raw, grade 1 at best bcse of crease or paper loss.  "350-460 O" is overprint.  The Camnitz Arms folded I can't figure the 30 - can't see crease or PL, I may just crossover on next submission.  Chesbro was a PSA4MC, crossed over to a 30 - lucky me :mad:

All prices are delivered!  PayPal (payment owed), check or MO.  Most at/close to VCP average, some below. Please let me know if you have any questions and as always, thank you for your time and interest!
